header.title: wxJoystickEvent

description.p: This event class contains information about joystick events, particularly events received by windows.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxEvent

section.title: Events
section.p: Use wxEvtHandler:connect/3 with wxJoystickEventType to subscribe to events of this type.

func.fsummary: Returns true if the event was a down event from the specified button (or any button).

desc.p: Returns true if the event was a down event from the specified button (or any button).

func.fsummary: Returns true if the specified button (or any button) was in a down state.

desc.p: Returns true if the specified button (or any button) was in a down state.

func.fsummary: Returns true if the event was an up event from the specified button (or any button).

desc.p: Returns true if the event was an up event from the specified button (or any button).

func.fsummary: Returns the identifier of the button changing state.

desc.p: Returns the identifier of the button changing state.
The return value is where n is the index of the button changing state, which can also be retrieved using GetButtonOrdinal() (not implemented in wx).
Note that for n equal to 1, 2, 3 or 4 there are predefined wxJOY_BUTTONn constants which can be used for more clarity, however these constants are not defined for the buttons beyond the first four.

func.fsummary: Returns the down state of the buttons.

desc.p: Returns the down state of the buttons.
This is a wxJOY_BUTTONn identifier, where n is one of 1, 2, 3, 4.

func.fsummary: Returns the identifier of the joystick generating the event - one of wxJOYSTICK1 and wxJOYSTICK2.

desc.p: Returns the identifier of the joystick generating the event - one of wxJOYSTICK1 and wxJOYSTICK2.

func.fsummary: Returns the x, y position of the joystick event.

desc.p: Returns the x, y position of the joystick event.
These coordinates are valid for all the events except wxEVT_JOY_ZMOVE.

func.fsummary: Returns the z position of the joystick event.

desc.p: Returns the z position of the joystick event.
This method can only be used for wxEVT_JOY_ZMOVE events.

func.fsummary: Returns true if this was a button up or down event (not 'is any button down?').

desc.p: Returns true if this was a button up or down event (not 'is any button down?').

func.fsummary: Returns true if this was an x, y move event.

desc.p: Returns true if this was an x, y move event.

func.fsummary: Returns true if this was a z move event.

desc.p: Returns true if this was a z move event.
